h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Worryfree Brew Location
content: On your right, you will cross a small walkway to find some Spider Cocoons blocking a doorway. Destroy them to find the Drink inside.

On your right, you will cross a small walkway to find some Spider Cocoons blocking a doorway. Destroy them to find the Drink inside.
